List of updates since Multichannel_bsslocate v1.0
-------------------------------------------------

### Multichannel_bsslocate v1.3 (november 2016):
-------------------------------------------------
##./mFiles/evaluation_tools/MBSS_eval_angle.m
# bug fixed :
- Curvilinear distance is now used for recall computation (old version implies issues with high elevation sources)
# update :
- Curvilinear distance is now a new output for accuracy evaluation.
- Comments

##./examples/example_2/MBSS_audioScene_parameters
# update:
- Comments

##./examples/example_2/MBSS_example2.m
# update:
- modifications of example outputs (add Precision - add F-measure - add accuracy computed with curvilinear distance) 


### Multichannel_bsslocate v1.2 (november 2016):
-------------------------------------------------
##./mFiles/localization_tools/MBSS_locate_spec.m
# bug fixed :
- Distance between estimated peaks is no longer using euclidian distance but curvilinear abscissa on ppfSpec2D result map (old version implies issues with high elevation results)
# update :
- Matlab R2015b update : map color adapted for Matlab R2015b

##release_note.txt added


### Multichannel_bsslocate v1.1 :
---------------------------------
##./mFiles/MBSS_preprocess.m
# bug fixed : "alpha" angles computation can no longer lead to complex numbers for weird input values
